thread.title: BRIEF-China Merchants Shekou Industrial Zone To Acquire Stake Of Dongfeng Motor's Property Unit

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-China Merchants Shekou Industrial Zone To Acquire Stake Of Dongfeng Motor's Property Unit

organizations.name: brief-china merchants shekou industrial zone to acquire stake of dongfeng motor
china merchants shekou industrial zone holdings co ltd

text:
Jan 9 (Reuters) - China Merchants Shekou Industrial Zone Holdings Co LTD:
* SAYS IT SIGNS AGREEMENT TO ACQUIRE 80 PERCENT STAKE OF DONGFENG MOTOR'S PROPERTY UNIT FOR 872.4 MILLION YUAN ($134.22 million) Source text in Chinese: bit.ly/2qGGleZ Further company coverage: ($1 = 6.5000 Chinese yuan renminbi) (Reporting by Hong Kong newsroom)
